\begin{tikzpicture}[
    every node/.append style={
        align = center,
        font=\sffamily\footnotesize,
        outer sep=0pt,
        inner sep=0pt
    },
    node0/.append style={lblue, fgray},
    line0/.append style={lblue, thick},
    line1/.append style={lblue, thick, dashed},
    block/.append style={
        line0, minimum width=2.7cm, minimum height=1.7cm, rounded corners=2pt
    },
    label/.append style={
        font=\sffamily\footnotesize\color{blue!70!black}, outer sep=2pt, inner sep=2pt
    }
]
\tikzmath{\step=0.4;}
% Blocks.
\node[block, AC] (step1) at (0,0) {};
\node[block, AW] (step2) at ($(step1.east)+(0.5cm,0)$) {};
\node[block, AW] (step3) at ($(step2.east)+(0.5cm,0)$) {};
\node[block, AW] (step4) at ($(step3.east)+(0.5cm,0)$) {};
% Labels.
\node[label, AN] at (step1.south) {\textbf{Step 1}\\Guess deviation\\bound};
\node[label, AN] at (step2.south) {\textbf{Step 2}\\Statistically verify\\deviation bound};
\node[label, AN] at (step3.south) {\textbf{Step 3}\\Refine deviation\\bound};
\node[label, AN] at (step4.south) {\textbf{Step 4}\\Statistically verify\\new bound};
% Arrows.
\draw[line0, ->] (step1) -- (step2);
\draw[line0, ->] (step2) -- (step3);
\draw[line0, ->] (step3) -- (step4);

% ==============================================================
% STEP 1
\begin{scope}[shift={($(step1.west)+(0.1cm,0)$)}]
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!10, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.1cm] (bound) at (0,0) {};
\draw[green!50!black] (0, 0) -- (2.5, 0);
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.2)
    (1*\step, 0.45)
    (2*\step, 0.4)
    (3*\step, 0.1)
    (4*\step, 0.4)
    (5*\step, 0.2)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, -0.2)
    (1*\step, -0.4)
    (2*\step, -0.5)
    (3*\step, -0.3)
    (4*\step, -0.2)
    (5*\step, -0.1)
    (6*\step, -0.2)
};
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.1)
    (1*\step, 0.4)
    (2*\step, 0.2)
    (3*\step, 0.6)
    (4*\step, 0.65)
    (5*\step, 0.4)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\draw[<-] (1*\step, +0.6) -- ($(bound.north)+(0,0.4cm)$);
\draw[<-] (1*\step, -0.6) -- ($(bound.north)+(0,0.4cm)$);
\node[AS] at ($(bound.north)+(0,0.5cm)$) {\scriptsize Guessed bounds};
\end{scope}

% ==============================================================
% STEP 2
\begin{scope}[shift={($(step2.west)+(0.1cm,0)$)}]
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!10, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.1cm] (bound) at (0,0) {};
\draw[green!50!black] (0, 0) -- (2.5, 0);
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.2)
    (1*\step, 0.45)
    (2*\step, 0.4)
    (3*\step, 0.1)
    (4*\step, 0.4)
    (5*\step, 0.2)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, -0.2)
    (1*\step, -0.4)
    (2*\step, -0.5)
    (3*\step, -0.3)
    (4*\step, -0.2)
    (5*\step, -0.1)
    (6*\step, -0.2)
};
\draw [dashed, thick, red] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.1)
    (1*\step, 0.4)
    (2*\step, 0.2)
    (3*\step, 0.6)
    (4*\step, 0.65)
    (5*\step, 0.4)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\draw[<-] (4*\step, 0.7) --++(0, 0.25);
\node[AS] at ($(bound.north)+(0,0.45cm)$) {
    \color{red}\scriptsize Trajectory violates bound};
\end{scope}

% ==============================================================
% STEP 3
\begin{scope}[shift={($(step3.west)+(0.1cm,0)$)}]
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!50, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.4cm] at (0,0) {};
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!10, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.1cm] (bound) at (0,0) {};
\draw[green!50!black] (0, 0) -- (2.5, 0);
\draw[<-] (1*\step, +0.7) -- ($(bound.north)+(0,0.4cm)$);
\draw[<-] (1*\step, -0.6) -- ($(bound.north)+(0,0.4cm)$);
\node[AS] at ($(bound.north)+(0,0.5cm)$) {\scriptsize Extended bounds};
\end{scope}

% ==============================================================
% STEP 4
\begin{scope}[shift={($(step4.west)+(0.1cm,0)$)}]
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!50, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.4cm] at (0,0) {};
\node[AW, outer sep=0pt, inner sep=0pt, fill=blue!10, minimum width=2.5cm, minimum height=1.1cm] at (0,0) {};
\draw[green!50!black] (0, 0) -- (2.5, 0);
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.2)
    (1*\step, 0.45)
    (2*\step, 0.4)
    (3*\step, 0.1)
    (4*\step, 0.4)
    (5*\step, 0.2)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\draw [dashed] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, -0.2)
    (1*\step, -0.4)
    (2*\step, -0.5)
    (3*\step, -0.3)
    (4*\step, -0.2)
    (5*\step, -0.1)
    (6*\step, -0.2)
};
\draw [dashed, thick] plot [smooth] coordinates {
    (0*\step, 0.1)
    (1*\step, 0.4)
    (2*\step, 0.2)
    (3*\step, 0.6)
    (4*\step, 0.65)
    (5*\step, 0.4)
    (6*\step, 0.1)
};
\end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}%
